title: Neural Enterprise Network (NEN) v1.x — Open Evaluation & Research Toolkit for Uncertainty-Aware Decision Intelligence
description:
This release provides the first open research artifact of the Neural Enterprise Network (NEN) — a cluster-based architecture for organizational decision intelligence with explainability and uncertainty built-in.

  • Outline & Figure: conceptual basis (papers/paper1_nen_uqxai/outline.md; figures/nen_architecture_0.0.1.png)
  • Evaluation toolkit: reproducible metrics (MAE, SMAPE, ECE, CRPS)
  • Typst paper draft: reproducible doc pipeline (papers/paper1_nen_uqxai/main.typ → paper.pdf)

Production implementations remain proprietary; this release covers open research components only.
notes: If you use this work, please cite as: Bornhäußer, L., & Cakar, T. (2025). Neural Enterprise Network (NEN) — Open Evaluation & Research Toolkit for Uncertainty-Aware Decision Intelligence. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.TBD
